ing: 1/2 cup herb and garlic-flavored cream cheese
des: "Quick and easy appetizer. Looks pretty on plate."
ins: Spread each salami slice with a thin layer of cream cheese; fold each salami slice in half over cream cheese layer. Place 1 tomato in the center of each salami half; roll salami around the tomato overlapping the two edges; secure edges to tomato with a toothpick.
